Unfortunately, the feelings weren't mutual, and Moda threw Jordella to the ground. With that, the guards carried him off. The rest remains to be seen."

61.heading: Institut Français d'Afrique du Sud.

61.author: [No author]

publication info.publisher: Pro Helvetia Liaison Office South Africa

notes: Sponsored and organized by Pro Helvetia Arts Council of Switzerland, Institut Français d'Afrique du Sud, Technikon Witwatersrand and Bitterkomix.

Catalogue accompanying an exhibition held at Spark! Gallery, Johannesburg, 6 November - 17 November 2002, ; Bell-Roberts Gallery, Cape Town, 18 December - 18 January 2003 ; NSA Gallery, Durban, 28 January - 16 February 2003.

An exhibition of work by South African, French, and Swiss comics artists Jean-Philippe Kalonji (Swiss, 1973-), Pascal Rabaté (French, 1961-), Karlien de Villiers (South African, 1975-), Igubu Collective (South African): (Vincent Sammy (1972-), Moray Rhoda (1969-), Daniel Hugo (1974-), Noel van Ster (1971-)), N.D. Mazin (Andy Mason, South African, 1954-), Thomas Ott (Swiss, 1966-), Jean-Philippe Stassen (Belgian, lives in France, 1966-), and Brendon Bell-Roberts, book designer and publisher (South African, 1967-).

notes: SUMMARY: Sam and Daffy create a monster with chewing gum for brains, who terrorizes the town by trying to sell insurance. k. Frankenstein. k. Monsters. k. Chewing Gum. k. Brains. k. Insurance Sales. k. Salesmen. k. Daffy Duck. Call no.: PN6728.4.G56Y6no.56

230.title: The Insurance Salesman.
230.author: [No author]
notes: 8 leaves : ill. ; 77 x 115 mm.
An "eight pager" or "Tijuana bible."

231.title: "An Insurance Salesman and a Jehovah's Witness"
231.author: Piraro.
notes: Summary: The three little pigs had been thinking the wolf at the door was bad enough.
Key word: Misfortune.

232.heading: Insurace Salesmen.
232.title: "Hammerhead Insurance Salesmen"
232.author: by Hauge
notes: One tier.

233.heading: Insurance Salesmen.
233.title: "Life Insurance"
233.author: [No author]
233.series: Pudgy Pig) 5 p. in Catholic Comics, v. 1, no. 9
notes: Summary: The story of the three pigs is re-enacted, with an insurance-selling weasel taking the part of the wolf.

234.heading: Insurance Salesmen.
234.title: "What Would the Widow's Benefits be, Say, Six Months from Now?"
234.author: by Unger
234.appears_in: p. 88 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: She's talking to an insurance salesman, and her husband is overhearing.

235.heading: Insurance Settlements.
235.title: "Milagro"
235.author: [No author]
235.series: Condorito) p. 7-8 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: Condorito wins a big insurance settlement for a suspicious injury, and the other lawyer is so angry he plans to follow him until he gets out of his wheelchair. Condorito's first stop is going to be Lourdes, however. Appearance of Comegato.

236.heading: Insurgency.
236.title: The Blank in the Comics strip collection includes a file of one or more daily comic strips related to this keyword or topic. Call no.: PN6726 f.B55
236.author: [No author]

238.heading: Insurgents.
238.title: "The Coalition is Continuing Offensive Operations to Establish a Stable Iraq"
238.author: G
notes: Summary: The enemies are "Al Quaeda, the Sadr militia, the Zarqawi network, Baathist insurgents, Hezbollah, the Sunni mujahedien and foreign jihads," plus some dead-enders.

239.heading: Insurgents.
239.title: "Gail
239.author: by Druillet
239.appears_in: p. 40-43 in Heavy Metal, v. 2, no. 7 (Nov. 1978).
notes: Begins: Holy Mary of the Angels. Just when the situation seems to be obviously improving in favor of the insurgents, outside the prison Shaan's squadrons fall upon us!!
"To be continued."

240.heading: La Insurrección de Coro.
240.title: José Leonardo y la Insurrección de Coro : verión libre en historieta
240.author: María Centeno.
notes: Includes bibliographical references.
Historical comic about José Leonardo Chirinos (d. 1796) and an insurrection by slaves, Indians and Mestizos in the mountains of Coro, Venezuela.
